actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East

official_title: A concurrent resolution supporting the President, in his efforts during his discussions with Soviet General Secretary Gorbachev, to obtain the support of the Soviet Union for a United Nations Security Council resolution calling for an international arms embargo against any party to the Iran-Iraq conflict which refuses to comply with the ceasefire and withdrawal to internationally recognized boundaries called for by United Nations Security Council Resolution 598.

summary.text: Declares support for the President in his efforts to obtain Soviet support for a U.N. Security Council resolution calling for an international arms embargo against any party to the Iran-Iraq conflict which refuses to comply with the ceasefire and the withdrawal to internationally recognized boundaries.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution supporting the President, in his efforts during his discussions with Soviet General Secretary Gorbachev, to obtain the support of the Soviet Union for a United Nations Security Council resolution calling for an international arms embargo against any party to the Iran-Iraq conflict which refuses to comply with the ceasefire and withdrawal to internationally recognized boundaries called for by United Nations Security Council Resolution 598.
